description: The pita Post is aiming to be one of the most talked about gourmet mobile food services in Michigan with a gourmet flair. The diversified menu of The Pita Post features pita sandwiches using all fresh and natural ingredients. Our bread is hand crafted from a special recipe and our sandwiches are made hot to order. Our features pitas are customized and unique. leaving you with a flavor that is out of this world! Your order can be created with your dietary lifestyle in mind with gluten free and vegetarian options available.We believe in freshness made great!
name: The Pita Post
